Purpose: Detection and quantification of antibodies against streptococcal antigens to aid in the diagnosis and management of streptococcal infections and their complications.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or plain red-top tube
Equipment: Calibrated pipettes or micropipettes, ELISA plates or Streptozyme test kits, incubator, water bath or heating block, EIA reader or manual spectrophotometer
